arts.ttl: Neymar Jr ‘very happy’ after swapping PSG for Saudi Arabia
arts.sum: In an interview with RMC Sport, Neymar Jr (32) has revealed his ‘happiness’ representing Al Hilal in Saudi Arabia. The Brazilian made his high-profile move to the Gulf State in 2023…
